data.title: Stephen Sondheim's Old Friends
data.meta_description: *Presented on subscription in the One CTG.One LA.2024/25 Season.One CTG subscriptions packages are available now.*.
data.text:
Center Theatre Group

In association with CMI and Daryl Roth

presents

Cameron Mackintosh’s Production of

STEPHEN SONDHEIM’S OLD FRIENDS

Starring Bernadette Peters and Lea Salonga

Music & Lyrics by Stephen Sondheim

Devised by Cameron Mackintosh

Musical Staging & Direction by Matthew Bourne

Side by Side with Julia McKenzie

Choreography by Stephen Mear

Originally Produced in London by Cameron Mackintosh

Venue Information

The Ahmanson Theatre is located at 135 N. Grand Ave., Los Angeles CA 90012.

Learn More

Ticket Prices

Tickets start at $40.25 (all-in pricing including fees).

Friends Ticket Presale

On sale: November 6, 2024

Donate $100 and access tickets to all Center Theatre Group shows before the general public for an entire year, with preferred pricing

Learn More

Amex Presale Tickets™

On sale: November 13, 2024

American Express® Card Members are invited to purchase tickets before they go on sale to the general public.

Learn More

Single Tickets

On sale: November 20, 2024

For Ahmanson shows:

213.972.4400

Opening Night

Performance date: February 13, 2025

Experience the magic of an opening night in the heart of L.A. with Premiere Pass! Join other theatregoers under 40 for a buzzy evening with drinks and celeb sightings. Learn more and become a Premiere Pass member.

Learn More

Account Sales and Group Tickets of 10+

Call 213.972.7231 to put your name on a priority access list.

Learn More

Performance Length

The performance length is 2 hour and 30 minutes with one 15-minute intermission.

Please Note

Recommended for ages 10 and up.

For more information, please visit our Show Guide for Parents.

Learn More

American Express® Card Member Performance

Join us for the American Express® Card Member Performance to access exclusive opportunities and post-show events.

Performance date: February 20, 2025
